0000000011000000 0010111111010101 1 -> sum: 0011000010010110, cout: 0
0011010111000100 0110110000110000 0 -> sum: 1010000111110100, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
